summary: Ported semantic_weak_completeness theorem from old Metalogic to Metalogic_v2, providing a sorry-free completeness core. Added semantic_truth_at_v2 definition, semantic_truth_lemma_v2, and the main semantic_weak_completeness theorem. Updated README.md documentation to reflect the new architecture.

artifacts.summary: Updated documentation with new theorems and architectural notes

next_steps: Review implementation summary. The semantic_weak_completeness theorem provides sorry-free completeness. Existing main_provable_iff_valid_v2 still has a sorry but is documented as deprecated approach.
